name: HerculesKabuterimon
effect: ＜Piercing＞ (When this Digimon attacks and deletes an opponent's Digimon and survives the battle, it performs any security checks it normally would.)[Main] ＜Digi-Burst 2＞ (Trash 2 of this Digimon's Digivolution cards to activate the effect below.)・Suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon.
